data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Although some people argue that some new innovations should not be pursued, I personally believe that all innovations are necessary. There are two reasons. Firstly, innovations can make people’s life easier and happier. For example, the innovation of cell phone technology enables mobile users to make phone calls and enjoy entertainment at any time and nearly anywhere. Secondly, medical innovations help patients recover from cancer. If medical researchers stop innovating, people with cancer might have to die. As a result, we have to pursue all innovations.
data.referenceText: Do you think all new innovations are worthy pursuits? Give examples to support your answer.
data.referenceTranslate: 你认为所有的创新都是值得追求的吗?请举例来支持你的回答。
